summary: The diff does not show any deployment artifacts, canister ID recording, or other evidence of redeploying the draft backend as a brand-new canister. It also includes a modification to backend/main.mo, which conflicts with the constraint/AC of making no functional backend changes (unless the change is strictly deployment-generated, which cannot be verified from the diff). No frontend changes are present in the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create and deploy the current draft backend as a brand-new canister (new canister ID differing from the previous draft backend canister ID).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only contains source/control files and does not include any deployment configuration/output or artifacts indicating a new canister was created/deployed or that the canister ID changed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Record the new backend canister principal/ID as an output of the deployment for verification/debugging.
missing_requirements.reason: No file in the diff captures or records a newly deployed canister principal/ID (e.g., in a deployment output file, README, or config).

missing_requirements.requirement: No functional code changes are made to backend/main.mo aside from any deployment-generated artifacts.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo is modified in the diff; from the summary alone it cannot be verified that changes are strictly deployment-generated artifacts rather than functional changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated a project tracking file (project_state.json) with feature request metadata and known issues.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to redeploy the existing draft backend as a new canister without changing code/behavior or making non-backend changes; adding/updating project management metadata is not part of the requested deployment outcome.
